HeroSection.heading: Meal planning made easy
HeroSection.subHeading: Eat healthier, save time, and enjoy delicious meals every day

FeaturesSection.heading: Simplify your meal planning, cooking, and grocery shopping
FeaturesSection.subHeading: Take the stress out of meal planning. With Eat-fast, you can easily plan your meals and save your recipes, we will generate the grocery list for you!

feature1.heading: Plan your meals ahead
feature1.subHeading: Discover the peace of mind that comes from having your meals planned out in advance — say goodbye to last-minute dinner decisions

feature2.heading: Save your favorite recipes
feature2.subHeading: No more lost recipe cards or forgotten web links; our app securely stores and organizes your recipes for quick retrieval anytime

feature3.heading: Auto-generate your grocery list
feature3.subHeading: Automatically turn your meal plans into a smart grocery list, ensuring you buy only what you need when you need it and never forget an ingredient again

CtaSection.heading: Ready to save precious hours every week?
CtaSection.subHeading: Say goodbye to the daily <important>what's for dinner?</important> puzzle and hello to quick, healthy, and flavorful cooking with no efforts!

PricingSection.heading: The last meal planner you'll ever need
PricingSection.subHeading: Unlock lifetime access to stress-free dining and simplified grocery shopping—start your <important>14-day risk-free trial</important> now
